thread.title: Don't Expect New Doctor Who Announcement Anytime Soon
thread.title_full: Don't Expect New Doctor Who Announcement Anytime Soon

author: Joseph Schmidt
title: Don't Expect New Doctor Who Announcement Anytime Soon
text:
Don't Expect New Doctor Who Announcement Anytime Soon Joseph Schmidt Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
With Steven Moffat on his way out the door and Peter Capaldi confirming Season 10 being his last as Doctor Who , many fans are left wondering what’s next for the BBC’s long-running franchise. 
Chris Chibnall is, a veteran writer of the series and of Torchwood , is set to take over showrunner duties for Season 11. But the producer is deep in the production of the third season of Broadchurch . UP NEXT: Peter Capaldi Announces Doctor Who Departure 
Speaking with RadioTimes.com , Chibnall made it clear that Broadchurch is getting his full devotion at the moment, saying that he’s focusing on editing the third season before shifting his focus to the Doctor. 
And because of those commitments—and his desire to give Moffat and Capaldi as much freedom as possible to finish the series as they see fit—Chibnall isn’t expected to undertake his search until the middle of the year. 
Chibnall will have the final say on who the Doctor is, but the report says he’ll have to get confirmation from BBC executives before they can move forward. 
While the production is still set to be ready for airing in 2018, Chibnall is also expected to take a vacation when his duties on Broadchurch are over.So don’t expect to find out who will be the star of the next series of Doctor Who until later this year. MUCH later. 
Doctor Who returns for Season 10 in April 2017. Doctor Who Sunday at on BBC ComicBook Composite 82.69 #14 All-Time Comic TV Shows Average rating
